meanings.definition: A person who plays a musical instrument.
meanings.sent1: The talented instrumentalists performed a beautiful melody on stage.
meanings.sent2: The instrumentalists in the orchestra played their violins with precision.
meanings.sent3: The instrumentalists had a friendly competition to see who could play the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The instrumentalists were like painters, creating a masterpiece with their music.
meanings.sent5: The young instrumentalists practiced diligently to improve their skills.

meanings.definition: A group of musicians who play instruments together.
meanings.sent1: The instrumentalists in the band had different roles but played in harmony.
meanings.sent2: The talented instrumentalists performed a lively tune at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The instrumentalists decided to start a band after playing together at a party.
meanings.sent4: The instrumentalists were a well-oiled machine, playing in perfect sync.
meanings.sent5: The instrumentalists filled the room with their melodious music.
